entry.title: COLD WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 10:00 A.M. MONDAY
entry.summary: January 27, 2025 4:00 a.m. A Cold Weather Advisory remains in effect through 10:00 a.m. Monday for much of southern Oregon. entry.summary: January 27, 2025 3:50 a.m. An Air Stagnation Advisory is in effect through 12:00 p.m. Thursday for much of southern Oregon. entry.title: ROSEBURG CITY COUNCIL MEETING MONDAY NIGHT
entry.summary: January 27, 2025 3:30 a.m. Roseburg City Council will consider several items on the agenda for its Monday night meeting. Councilors will consider increasing the compensation for City Manager Nikki Messenger by 5 percent to $15,562 per month. That would be effective retroactively to September 1st of last year.
